dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2018 IS: To modify certain limitations and exclusions regarding defense articles and requirements regarding security assistance and sales with respect to the Republic of Cyprus.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Booker (for himself and Mr. Moran) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations

form.official-title: To modify certain limitations and exclusions regarding defense articles and requirements regarding security assistance and sales with respect to the Republic of Cyprus.

section.header: Modification to waivers of limitations on transfer of articles on United States munitions list to Republic of Cyprus

subsection.header: Eastern mediterranean security and energy partnership Act of 2019
subsection.text: Section 205(d)(2) of the Eastern Mediterranean Security and Energy Partnership Act of 2019 (Public Law 116â€“94; 133 Stat. 3052), is amended by striking one fiscal year and inserting three fiscal years.

subsection.header: National defense authorization Act for fiscal year 2020
subsection.text: Section 1250A(d)(2) of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2020 (22 U.S.C. 2373 note), is amended by striking one fiscal year and inserting three fiscal years.
